The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.

X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ X ▢ X ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix with a diagonal line of 'X' symbols from the top left to the bottom right. The 'X' symbols are positioned at coordinates (1,1), (2,2), (3,3), (4,4), and (5,5). The remaining cells are filled with empty squares (▢). The pattern is symmetric along the main diagonal.<|im_end|>
continue
